set.name: DMSD-15 King Master Start Deck: Onifuda's Onitime

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature costs 5 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution darkness or fire creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-15 King Master Start Deck: Onifuda's Onitime

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets +3000 power and "double breaker".

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When this creature attacks for the first time each turn, untap it. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, when this creature is destroyed, if you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 8000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets "blocker". (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to that creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, ignore this creature's "can't attack" ability. ■ When this creature loses a battle, put it from your graveyard into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put one of your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, your cards can't leave the shield zone during this creature's attack.
